title: Leveling up
body: I just made a smurf account and played on it but when i plaed 3 games i wasn't even lv 2 is that a bugg ?

replies.body: Not a bug, you may just not have gotten enough experience to level up your Summoner level yet. What kind of matches were you playing?

No. The leveling system is the old one still. The new leveling system will go live with preseason.

I know that frustration though...

Don't buy an account. It will be easy to level up soon enough.
